page.title: 08GOV.MENT IN THE CH.BURN AREA
page.content: The goverment of the area is arranged in a 3 tier system.At the grass roots is the Parish Council,in the middle the District Council and at the top Lancs.County Council.The Parish Coun- cil is the sounding board for complai- nts to be forwarded to the higher au- thorities but it is also concerned at village level with the provision and upkeep of Playing Fields,Village Halls and in keeping the village tidy for the Best Kept Village Competition. Parish Councillors(8)are elected every 4 years.The Ribble Valley Borough Cou- ncil is responsible for Housing,Public Works and Health,Planning and Recrea- ion which includes Parks,Swimming Baths and Sports Halls.The Lancs.County Coun- Council's main responsibility is for Education,Highways,Soc.Services,Police, Fire Services and Waste Disposal.The M. P.David Waddington is a Gov.Minister
